f = h5py.File('particle_attributes_zoltan.particles.Thomas.h5part', 'r') n = len(f)-1 att_chem1 = f[f'/Step#{n}/Chem1'][:] attributes_error = att_chem1 - 5.0 attributes_error_1=abs(attributes_error).max()
print ("max error",attributes_error_1)
